name: Asphyre Sphinx Archive File
summary: Learn about .ASVF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: In order to run Asphyre Sphinx on the Windows platform, the program requires Delphi including FireMonkey and FreePascal/Lazarus.
NOTE: These files used to be known as .ASDB files but were changed to ASVF. AsphyreManager should automatically convert any ASDB files to the ASVF version.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
